name: Herald of Havoc
description:
Use an arsenal of unique weapons to fight enemies like soldiers, minotaurs, or even giant metal colossus. Different levels of difficulty are available to make the game accessible from casual gamer, to the most hardcore one.



Explore the hand-crafted world and look out for various secrets areas hidden across the environment… You may find additional loot that will help you throughout your journey.




Seize a vast arsenal of unique weapons, each one having a primary fire and a secondary fire. Master each weapons specificity and carve your path through to victory.




For each level, earn a badge by completing it. The badge will be bronze, silver or gold depending on the difficulty setting.
